document.full_text: world no. 2 lee westwood believes asian teenagers ryo ishikawa and noh seung-yul are capable of becoming the continent's first golfers to top the world rankings.
document.title: westwood tips asian teens ishikawa, noh for top golf spot
lines_and_colors: world no. 2 lee westwood believes asian teenagers ryo ishikawa and noh seung-yul are capable of becoming the continent's first golfers to top the world rankings.
